short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables users to upload files for ChatGPT to analyze and summarize.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The author is 陳棨煜 (Chi-Yu Chen) in MHCI lab, Dept CSIE, National Formosa University. The GPT Code Reviewer Ext will automatically put multiple project source content into ChatGPT input field with check length. With the prompts: manual, API, parameters,flow chart and review. The GPT Code Reviewer will analyze these code, ans it be your great coding helper.
